spec.name: Avg_H
spec.query:
timeRange = 1h

from(bucket: "bucket")
    |> range(start: -timeRange)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "readings")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] != "Device_ID")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: timeRange, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> to(bucket: "longterm_bucket", org: "texol")
